smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (3 * size.x / size.y / 4) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: 3 * size.x / size.y / 4
Parentheses in (percent * bounds.width() / 100 - halfLineSize) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: percent * bounds.width() / 100 - halfLineSize

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.

smells.name: ExpressionBodySyntax

smells.name: ForbiddenComment
smells.description: Flags a forbidden comment. Defaults values are TODO:, FIXME: or STOPSHIP:

instances.message: This comment contains text that has been defined as forbidden in detekt.
This comment contains text that has been defined as forbidden in detekt.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: com.github.moko256.latte.client.base.entity.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.view.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.view.View.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.graphics.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
com.github.moko256.latte.client.base.entity.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
com.github.moko256.twitlatte.mediaview.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
com.github.moko256.latte.client.base.entity.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
com.github.moko256.latte.client.base.entity.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
com.github.moko256.latte.client.base.entity.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
com.sys1yagi.mastodon4j.api.method.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
com.github.moko256.latte.client.base.entity.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
com.github.moko256.latte.client.base.entity.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
com.github.moko256.latte.client.base.entity.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
twitter4j.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of FitSystemWindowsRelativeLayout.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of ImageKeyboardEditText.

smells.name: UseDataClass
smells.description: Classes that do nothing but hold data should be replaced with a data class.

instances.message: The class ImageTableData defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
The class DialogContent defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.

smells.name: MandatoryBracesIfStatements
smells.description: Multi-line if statement was found that does not have braces. These should be added to improve readability.

instances.message: Multi-line if statement was found that does not have braces. These should be added to improve readability.

smells.description: Private member is unused.

instances.message: Function parameter view is unused.

smells.description: Optional braces in when expression

smells.name: ReturnCount
smells.description: Restrict the number of return statements in methods.

instances.message: Function switchIntent has 13 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.

smells.name: DataClassContainsFunctions
smells.description: Data classes should mainly be used to store data and should not have any extra functions. (Compiler will automatically generate equals, toString and hashCode functions)

instances.message: The data class AccessToken contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called getKeyString
The data class AccessToken contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called getHash

smells.name: SerialVersionUIDInSerializableClass
smells.description: A class which implements the Serializable interface does not define a correct serialVersionUID field. The serialVersionUID field should be a constant long value inside a companion object.

instances.message: The class RequestToken implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.
The class Media implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.
The class Emoji implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.
